title: Idle Dice
description: Idle Dice is an addictive clicker idle game where every roll of the dice decides your fate, so roll wisely! The points you earn are based on your rolls, and as you accumulate more points, you can invest them in powerful upgrades and unlock additional dice to boost your score even further. Keep the momentum going, stack up your rewards, and let a bit of smooth jazz guide you as you roll your way to higher scores and endless rewards.
